summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West Rose Street, from 39th Avenue Southwest to California Avenue; West Southern Street, from 39th Avenue Southwest to 44th Avenue Southwest; West Elmgrove Street, from 39th Avenue Southwest to California Avenue; West Kenyon Street, from 39th Avenue Southwest to California Avenue; Northrup Place, from West Thistle Street to West Southern Street; 44th Avenue Southwest, from West Thistle Street to West Prentice Street; 45th Avenue Southwest, from Kingsbury Street to West Prentice Street; 46th Avenue Southwest, from West Thistle Street to West Prentice Street; Kingsbury Street, from Fauntleroy Avenue to 44th Avenue Southwest; Hemlock Way, from 46th Avenue Southwest to 45th Avenue Southwest; 41st Avenue Southwest, from West Thistle Street to West Kenyon Street; California Avenue from West Thistle Street to Roosevelt Street; Roosevelt Street, from California Avenue to 44th Avenue Southwest; 44th Avenue Southwest, from Roosevelt Street to Lowman Drive; Lowman Drive, from 44th Avenue Southwest to Wright Avenue; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 39943 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
